top_categories.workout_context: TransRockies Gravel Royale’s 200-mile distance demands power production deep into fatigue — the defining challenge of ultra-distance gravel.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at TransRockies Gravel Royale when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
TransRockies Gravel Royale’s 20,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
TransRockies Gravel Royale rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
TransRockies Gravel Royale’s bc mountains, multi-stage demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing TransRockies Gravel Royale isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Every session at TransRockies Gravel Royale intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.
At 200 miles, TransRockies Gravel Royale rewards a massive aerobic engine. This volume work builds the fat-oxidation capacity that keeps you moving when glycogen runs low.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of TransRockies Gravel Royale. Make this intensity feel like home.
TransRockies Gravel Royale’s bc mountain gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what TransRockies Gravel Royale’s bc mountain gravel delivers on race day.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for TransRockies Gravel Royale’s 20,000ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.

race_overlay.nutrition: Ultra-distance fueling for 200 miles: 80–100g carbs/hour from mile 1 — don’t wait until you’re hungry. Practice your exact race-day nutrition in every long training ride. Carry backup calories. 200 miles burns 8,000–12,000+ calories — you cannot replace them all, but you must try.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at TransRockies Gravel Royale. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at TransRockies Gravel Royale requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on bc mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: bc mountains, multi-stage, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, Over Under, and Mixed Climbing to prepare you for 200 miles of bc mountain gravel in British Columbia, Canada.
